alert.note: Alert for Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 9:45PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS AND SOUTHEASTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES THROUGH 1030 PM CST... At 945 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hayes, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jennings, Welsh, Iowa, Lake Arthur, Mermentau, Hayes, Thornwell, Lacassine, Bell City, and Roanoke. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 48 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion
